author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...DEXTER FORECAST TO BECOME A POWERFUL EXTRATROPICAL CYCLONE AS IT MOVES ACROSS THE NORTH ATLANTIC...
summary: ...DEXTER FORECAST TO BECOME A POWERFUL EXTRATROPICAL CYCLONE AS IT MOVES ACROSS THE NORTH ATLANTIC... As of 5:00 PM AST Wed Aug 06 the center of Dexter was located near 40.0, -56.3 with movement ENE at 16 mph. The minimum central pressure was 999 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Dexter (AT4/AL042025)
